Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Best price!!”
Reviews.Author: Rray99
Reviews.Content: Hotel is located in Phoenix downtown. We enjoyed are stay at this hotel. Rooms were clean and staff was friendly. I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “What a excellent location & price”
Reviews.Author: cougertown
Reviews.Content: Arizona compliting 100 years... the celebration was waking distance.. rooms small but good clean

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience For A Small Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ronald H
Reviews.Content: The rooms where clean and comfortable and very affordable. Best West Inn is conviently located in Downtown Phoenix and the Convention Center was in walking distance. Great place I will definetly stay there for next years convention.

Reviews.Title: “Steer well clear!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ron S
Reviews.Content: Disgusting - rooms generally dirty and smelly; bathrooms dirty; beds unmade and those that were obviously hadn't been changed. The sheets did not feel fresh and clean. Very bad vibe about the place. Arrived in the evening and it was almost intimidating - the type of place that rents out rooms 'by the hour'. Drug addicts and other assorted low-lifes wandering about. Went straight back and to 'reception' (behind bullet-proof glass) and told them we would NOT be staying.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel near downtown”
Reviews.Author: Jason L
Reviews.Content: This is one of the better choice hotels near the downtown area. The rooms are clean and the service is friendly. I would recommend Best West to anyone on a trip to the phx area!

Reviews.Title: “WARNING - DO NOT STAY HERE - TERRIBLE”
Reviews.Author: David K
Reviews.Content: If I could give negative star, I would but unfortunately that is not possible. When I arrived I was greeted in the lobby from behind thick, bullet proof glass and the lobby was dimly lit and dirty. When I got into my room, the carpet was not vacuumed, the room smelled of mold and urine and the sheets were dirty. There was peeling paint on the outside corridor and the door looked wobbly. I decided to leave within a couple minutes and sought a refund but the manager and owner refused to give a refund despite the terrible conditions. DO NOT STAY HERE.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel & Close to Downtown”
Reviews.Author: Ann M
Reviews.Content: Excellent location to downtown Phoenix, Nice Amenities, & Great Hospitality.

Reviews.Title: “Easy access to downtown”
Reviews.Author: Davtheman
Reviews.Content: Had a good time, they just remodel, it looks very good, I enjoy my stay.... The bed are new comfortable. Across of the Motel is Mcdonals... We just wake it the street, very good view of the tall buildings. At the motel the staff was great.. We recommend to all my friends, how are reading the reviews of this hotel Best West Inn Downtown.

Reviews.Title: “A complete scam”
Reviews.Author: jeebusmn
Reviews.Content: This is a junkie crack prostitutes hotel. I was only able to get a partial refund from E-x-p-e-d-i-a by promising once I got back from my convention I was going to take them to small claims court for false advertising. The photos look nothing like what the place is really like. The teller hides behind bulletproof glass, the tv didn't work, the phone and remote were missing, the main lamp didn't work, the place smells like butt, the carpet is nasty, there are prostitutes hanging at the hotel at night. I feel lucky I wasn't mugged of my laptop. Any good reviews of this hotel have to in my opinion be by the owner. The only business I am guessing they get is from people who basically live their and people who get suckered in online. This is by far the worst hotel I have ever stayed at. EVER If you have a coworker you worker ,going to a convention in Phoenix, that you don't like recommending this hotel would be a little on the mean side.

Reviews.Title: “Great Times”
Reviews.Author: hshsyayss
Reviews.Content: This was one ofbthe best stays I've ever had. I would go back if I had to. I wasn't to happy with the location but it was fine. For breakfast there was only coffee. The was a convieniet location for a McDonald's right across the road. I would deffinetly recommended this motel t anyone out there.

HotelInfo.Name: Best West Inn Downtown
HotelInfo.Address: 600 W. Van Buren Street, Phoenix, AZ 85003
